Reference

Python (Jupyter Notebook)

Function from the CalAdaptApi.py Library that interact with the CalAdapt API and FTP site

createChart()

Creates a chart using the arcpy libary and populates the chart from a table. This could be from the table created using the createTable() function and the CalAdapt API

createTable()

Creates a table using the arcpy libary and populates the table with the results from the CalAdapt API

createWKT()

Generates well know text (wkt) representation of spatial data for use in the returnData() function and the CalAdapt API

downloadData()

Initiates and downloads data from the CalAdapt FTP site

freshResourceList()

Initiates and downloads data from the CalAdapt FTP site

getResourcename()

Generates a list of resources available on CalAdapt API, using the resources list create by the freshResourceList() function.

getvariables()

Generates a list of variables available on CalAdapt API (when searching for one or many ietms such as variable, gcm, period, or scenario), uses the resources list create by the freshResourceList() function.

makeFileName()

Generates the url and potential file names for the request to the FTP site

returnData()

Creates a list of resources available on CalAdapt using the CalAdapt API
